meanings.definition: The money used in a particular country.
meanings.sent1: Different countries have their own currencies.
meanings.sent2: People exchange currencies when they travel abroad.
meanings.sent3: The currencies from different countries had a party and danced all night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the currency that brightened up his day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful currencies in his collection sparkled like jewels.

meanings.definition: The fact or quality of being widely accepted or in use.
meanings.sent1: The widespread currencies in the market make trade easier.
meanings.sent2: Digital currencies are gaining popularity globally.
meanings.sent3: The currencies of kindness and respect are always in demand.
meanings.sent4: Trust is the currency that strengthens relationships.
meanings.sent5: Happiness is a valuable currency in life.
